item.description:
I think the "Javascript Workshop" will be a big monthly event (next one is May 3, to be announced shortly). If some people want to meet sooner, April 19 is an option - if at least 10 people sign up for this "little" meetup, I'll go ahead and host it.

We'll probably spend 20 minutes to introduce ourselves and set an agenda, then break into groups (JQuery, html5, Node.js, beginners, etc) depending on what kind of people show up.

P.S.: Designers are encouraged to attend - we'll help you out with this js/html5 craziness! :)

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: A little Javascript workshop
